alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Worcester, southwestern Norfolk, south central Middlesex and north central Providence Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Northbridge, or near Milford, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Woonsocket, Cumberland, Franklin, Milford, Grafton, Bellingham, Northbridge, Hopkinton, Holliston, Uxbridge, Medway, Medfield, Norfolk, Wrentham, Blackstone, Sutton, Douglas, Millis, Upton and Hopedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk
